title: Enroll a New Member in the Frequent Flyer Program
description: A customer wants to sign up for the airline's loyalty program.

tasks.description: Collect the customer's personal details (name, address, email) to create the account.
Create a new frequent flyer account in the system.
Provide the customer with their new frequent flyer number and explain the program's basic benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the new number and welcomes the member to the program.
